description.p: BSc (Hons), Computer Science and Economics, First Class (highest honors)
Thesis: 'Strategies for improving the performance of data-intensive distributed systems' (Python, AWS)
3x Deans' List and 3 class medals for outstanding academic achievement
Engineering and developing solutions to increase small business owner engagement (Python, JavaScript)

ul.li: Contributed to the ongoing efforts to launch the 'Yelp Deals' product in Europe
Acting as project lead for a new UI component which is projected to significantly increase business data quality
Effectively communicating knowledge acquired at the SF office to help fellow engineers achieve maximum productivity

description.p: Planned and built scalable and efficient backend code to help Community Managers engage the Yelp community (Python, JavaScript)

ul.li: Led effort to refactor major user watchlist to a scalable service-oriented architecture
Reengineered business duplicate listing detection engine to significantly improve data quality at Yelp
Built several UI components resulting in productivity improvements for our community managers

description.p: Maintained a custom-made legacy CMS and CRM used by the Johannes Kepler University Linz Alumni Association (PHP/MySQL)

ul.li: Increased CRM performance by almost 200% through restructuring the MySQL database and stored procedures
Found and fixed a major bug in the university's LAMP stack that affected outgoing e-mails and had not been spotted by senior IT staff

subsection.name: Co-Founder / CEO
subsection.location: filuan network solutions GbR (filuan.net), Linz, Austria

description.p: Co-founded the business to develop and market low-cost WiFi hotspot systems to schools and hotels. The systems use a custom-made firmware and management server/console (based on openWRT, Ubuntu and Ruby)

ul.li: Successfully sold and deployed 2 systems in the first two months with an excellent reliability record
Significantly reduced cost (up to 70%) by using and modifiying existing open source projects
Improved the delivered bandwidth by 50% through implementing QoS with custom L7 filters

description.p: Creating a high-quality online market-place and event list for my university community (Ruby on Rails)

ul.li: In charge of all stages of web app development - database design through UI to deployment
Implemented automatic Facebook API mining - 50% more relevant events listed than competing websites

description.p: Co-developed software to manage a textbook database for use in a charity used textbook market (PHP/MySQL)

ul.li: Scaled and optimized database to be able to efficiently manage $60,000 worth of assets
Increased efficieny of data migration from legacy data sources by 100% through pattern matching algorithms
